title: WTB - T213-2 Frank Chance Port. - NYA

posts.post_title: WTB - T213-2 Frank Chance Port. - NYA
posts.post_content:
Happy New Year.

Looking to complete my run of T213-2 NY Americans and down to one card.  If you have a Frank Chance Portrait, NYA your willing to part with please shoot me an email or PM with scans and price.

Many thanks.
Mike

Bump...I know this is a tough card but what better place to see if someone has one they are wiling to part with!

Thanks, Mike
